properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT QNA_NO , BOARD_TITLE , CREATE_DATE , REPLY , OPEN , MEM_ID FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER ON(BOARD_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE Q.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM QNA WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO QNA ( QNA_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , QNA_VIEWS , CREATE_DATE , STATUS , OPEN , REPLY , BOARD_WRITER ) VALUES ( SEQ_QNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , 0 , SYSDATE , 'Y' , ? , DEFAULT , ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO , REF_BNO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , UPLOAD_DATE , STATUS , CATEGORY ) VALUES ( SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_QNO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , 'Y' , 'QNA' )
SELECT FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BNO = ? AND CATEGORY = 'QNA' AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FAQ_NO , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_CONTENT FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FAQ_NO , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_CONTENT FROM FAQ WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE QNA SET QNA_VIEWS = QNA_VIEWS + 1 WHERE QNA_NO = ?
SELECT QNA_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , QNA_VIEWS , CREATE_DATE , OPEN , REPLY , MEM_ID FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER ON(MEM_NO = BOARD_WRITER) WHERE QNA_NO = ? AND Q.STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO FAQ ( FAQ_NO , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_CONTENT , STATUS , FAQ_WRITER ) VALUES ( SEQ_FAQNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , DEFAULT , 1 )
